interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara Review Date: 2020/07/23 Store: SIKEMAY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} Review Text: First off I wear contact lens and so far I've had no adverse reaction. I've only tried it once and it stayed put for 24 hrs, even though a shower! Now that's what I call really waterproof! I don't normally sleep in makeup of any kind but wanted to give it an "all night" durability test. Woke up the next morning....was still there! Expected at least some "mascara" marks on my pillowcase but there was nary a mark. But my biggest surprise came when I awoke without "racoon eyes"!!! I usually wear "tubing" mascaras as other formulas end up under my eyes within a few hours, I actually expected this mascara to do the same.

Volume and length? It definitely added length. I use Latisse so my lashes have stayed long as I've aged and this mascara provided additional length. As to volume, not so much. However, I only used one coat so it may indeed give the volume advertised with another coat. I really did not notice any "fibers" and being a lens wearer perhaps that's not a bad thing. The formula is not thick so it applies smoothly without leaving clumps. It was fairly easy to remove with a cotton pad soaked in micro-cellular water. All in all, if you are looking for staying power this mascara is worthy of a try.

The packaging is unique! Hans Holbein's portrait of a young Princess Elizabeth [later Queen Elizabeth I] just caught my eye. I found the square shape vs round tube a lot easier to hold and the brush is a standard design found on many other mascara brands. Review Title: WORTHY OF A TRY FOR STAYING POWER ALONE PLUS- No Racoon Eyes! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sigma 3DHD - Precision Brush - Pink {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Brass', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 1 x 8 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 8 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3DP02'} This is another great brush from Sigma! I now have 4 Sigma brushes and all four are of outstanding quality. This little brush does exactly what Sigma's website says it will do (see the video on their site) and I highly recommend it. I no longer see any reason to pay $40 and up for one makeup brush when Sigma offers such a large variety of brushes at half the price! Another win for Sigma R-NEU 200 Cotton Rounds, 100% Natural Turkish Cotton Makeup Remover and Facial Cleansing Cotton Round Pads, Waffle Textured Hypoallergenic Cotton Wipes, 2.25 Inch Diameter (200 Pack) R-NEU {'Size': '2.25 Inch (Pack of 200)', 'Brand': 'R-NEU', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 4.8 x 2.28 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'yhua8a-654', 'UPC': '696292837730', 'Manufacturer': 'R-NEU'} Swisspers is my usual brand but for some strange reason I decided to give these a try. They're "ok" ...they are soft and absorbent but they tend to shed fibers even when wet. As I use these around my eye area that is not a good thing! Will return to my usual rounds. JUST OK 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara SIKEMAY {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} First off I wear contact lens and so far I've had no adverse reaction. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** While the user maintains a strong preference for Sigma products, they display an openness to trying other brands, as evidenced by their positive experience with a recent mascara purchase from a different brand.
- **Value-Conscious:** The user consistently seeks affordable options that do not compromise on quality, showing discernment when selecting beauty products.
- **Quality Focused:** A high priority is placed on quality makeup tools, with recent experiences reinforcing this focus while also showcasing a willingness to explore alternative products when they meet performance expectations.
- **Frequency of Use:** Regular use of brushes, cleansing tools, and mascaras indicates a robust commitment to beauty routines and makeup application.
- **Cosmetics Enthusiast:** The user’s involvement with cosmetics tools reflects a keen interest in makeup artistry and functionality.
- **Skin Type & Age Range:** Engages with versatile products suitable for all skin types and adult demographics, further illustrating their broad approach to product selection.
- **Product Review Behavior:** While typically providing positive reviews, the user openly shares dissatisfaction when products fall short of expectations, highlighting their discerning nature regarding product performance and effectiveness.

The user recently tested a mascara known for its durability and waterproof properties, expressing satisfaction with its longevity and lack of smudging, alongside a unique packaging design, underscoring their ongoing commitment to high-quality, reliable beauty products.
